title: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description:
Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved (including the quotes). And then the user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog titled "Error" (including the quotes).

OB: N/A

EB: A better and more typical approach would be:
- The dialog should use a better title (and certainly should not have the quotes).

SR: N/A
